org.antfarmer.ejce.parameter

Class PbeParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.antfarmer.ejce.parameter.AbstractAlgorithmParameters<T>
      • org.antfarmer.ejce.parameter.AbstractSymmetricAlgorithmParameters<T>
        • org.antfarmer.ejce.parameter.AbstractBlockCipherParameters<PbeParameters>
          • org.antfarmer.ejce.parameter.PbeParameters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AlgorithmParameters<PbeParameters>, SymmetricAlgorithmParameters<PbeParameters>

    public class PbeParameters
extends AbstractBlockCipherParameters<PbeParameters>
    AlgorithmParameters object used for PBE (Password-Based Encryption).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

        public static final int DEFAULT_SALT_SIZE
        Default size of salt array in bytes. The default value is 8.

      • DEFAULT_ITERATION_COUNT

        public static final int DEFAULT_ITERATION_COUNT
        Default number of PBE iterations. The default value is 500.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_PASSWORD_SIZE

        public static final int DEFAULT_PASSWORD_SIZE
        Default size of randomly generated passwords in bytes. The default value is 20.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • PbeParameters

        public PbeParameters()
        Initializes the PbeParameters. The default transformation is 'PBEWithMD5AndDES'.

      • PbeParameters

        public PbeParameters(TextEncoder textEncoder)
        Initializes the PbeParameters with a TextEncoder which is used to decode the key when set as a string. The default transformation is 'PBEWithMD5AndDES'.
        Parameters:
        textEncoder - the TextEncoder
